mapper.select: SELECT EDU.* ,EAPP.EMP_NO FROM EDUCATION EDU, (SELECT * FROM EDUAPPLY WHERE EMP_NO =#{emp_no} ) EAPP WHERE EDU.EDU_NO = EAPP.EDU_NO (+)
SELECT EDU.*, REP.EDUREP_NO FROM EDUAPPLY EAPP, EDUREPORT REP, EDUCATION EDU WHERE EAPP.EDU_NO = REP.EDU_NO (+) AND EDU.EDU_NO = EAPP.EDU_NO AND eapp.EMP_NO=#{emp_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EDUAPPLY SELECT SEQ_EAAP_NO.NEXTVAL,#{emp_no},#{edu_no} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT EMP_NO FROM EDUAPPLY WHERE EMP_NO=#{emp_no} AND EDU_NO=#{edu_no})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EDUAPPLY WHERE EMP_NO=#{emp_no} AND EDU_NO=#{edu_no}
mapper.insert: insert into eduReport (EDUREP_NO, EDU_NO, EMP_NO, EDUREP_TITLE, EDUREP_CONTENT, EDUREP_DATE) values (seq_eduRep.nextval,#{edu_no},#{emp_no},#{edurep_title},#{edurep_content},SYSDATE)
mapper.update: update edureport set edurep_title=#{edurep_title}, edurep_content=#{edurep_content} where edurep_no=#{edurep_no}
